sourcesContent:
This is a Parent components

example of two way binding
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { child } from '../model/child'; @Component({ selector: 'app-parent', templateUrl: './parent.component.html', styleUrls: ['./parent.component.css'] }) export class ParentComponent { children:child[]=[ {name:"ena", count:1}, {name:"dva", count:2}, {name:"tri", count:2} ] }
